Text:
We've received a report from the mercenary troops
who were lying in wait on Midway Road.

They've robbed the wagons belonging to Luna, Ltd.
and transported them to the designated location as
planned.
Hehehe...hahaha! It's all going perfectly to plan!

This, combined with the reports from the other roads,
means all of their wagons from the trade cities will
no longer reach their new store!

And with just two days until their grand opening—
we've won!
I-It's all gone wrong!

What is it? Calm down! We're celebrating here, and
you're ruining the vibe—

As we speak, a massive amount of cargo is arriving at
their new store!
Whaaat?!

...How is that possible?! We've raided all their
wagons!

Yes...there's no doubt of that. We hired several
credible mercenary companies for the job.

The cargo remains untouched, and the mercenaries have
transported them to several designated locations.
Then why is cargo being delivered to Luna, Ltd.?!

That's the thing... The goods are being delivered
mainly by private distributors from the provinces!

Ridiculous! How can the products of such a small
group of suppliers cover the inventory required for
a store that size?!

Based on a preliminary count, over four hundred
suppliers were going in and out!
Four hundred?!

And tomorrow there will be even more coming in from
even farther regions, by the looks of it!

Their new store has become the talk of the community
due to the regular deliveries lining up out front!

Are you suggesting there's been so little advertising
leading up to the opening because they anticipated
this would happen?!

...St-Still, that doesn't change the fact that we've
dealt them a severe blow!
What're we going to do...?!

Let's head to the hideout where we've transported all
their cargo! We'll uncover their future business plans
based on their merchandise!
You stay here and keep an eye on Luna, Ltd.!
Y-Yes, sir!

(Master Shadow...! I've finally, finally made it this
far!)

Gamma, do you know how to turn this potato into a
gem?

...You're not talking about some sort of experiment,
are you?!

Would it perhaps be selling potatoes somewhere where
they don't exist...?

But is there anywhere in the world where potatoes
don't exist?

You're on the right track. The basis of business is
creating value through trade.
So how do we create that value outside of trade?

How about selling the story? For example, "These
potatoes were grown by an amazing farmer from
such-and-such a place!"

Yeah, promoting quality with an emphasis on nature is
not a bad idea, but countless others have already done
that.
If it were me, this is what I'd do—
...Whoa! It does feels like they're sparkling now!

Work on the entire space and the display of the
products themselves.

Strangely enough, when you do that, ordinary potatoes
start looking like special potatoes.

The potatoes you find sitting around in a market
appeal to people's everyday values with their
simplicity.

But by carefully displaying them as a product, you
can transform them into items that fully stimulate
the sense of value in the people who see them.

Value is more than just a customer's desire for a
product.

It is the ability to create curiosity and desire
within a customer for a product they were
unaware they even wanted.

In other words, it's essential to appeal to their
invisible demands.
*gasp*

Building a space that creates that awareness is the
Shadow Wisdom that makes potatoes shine like jewels!
Exactly. And let's see... The name of that space is—
(The Shadow Wisdom my lord once shared with me...)

(As the face of the Garden's source of funds, this
is the start of a multi-purpose commercial complex
inspired by none other than Master himself!)

Ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for coming
to the opening ceremony of Luna, Ltd.'s new store.

Thanks to the support of suppliers from various
regions whom we have developed strong ties with
over the years, today we can celebrate the grand
opening of our new store.

I would first like to express my deepest gratitude to
those suppliers and merchants who have provided us
with their products.

Our new store will also serve as a major retail
center in the capital, and we intend to expand
with related facilities in the future.

We began as a small business when we restructured
this company, and we will continue to handle small
business transactions without neglect.

We hope our suppliers will continue to rely on us not
only to sell their products but also as a relay facility
or small-lot mail orders, connecting the distribution
of goods between remote locations.

Our store will be a commercial complex with a fashion
department dedicated to fine menswear, our principal
merchandise. Then our food and daily commodities
department—

—which will include tea, and our flagship, a permanent
indoor Tuna King restaurant.

We are proud to say this business model will offer a
completely new shopping experience that has never
before existed in Midgar Kingdom.

With this new store, Luna, Ltd. will leap from the
present to the future with our business partners
and customers.

As our first memorable step, we have changed our
company name.
I hereby declare the establishment of Mitsugoshi, Ltd.!

We look forward to welcoming you all at our
Mitsugoshi store!
...Wh-What's this? What the hell is going on?!

Why is every wagon load full of stones, wood chips...
and junk?!

Less than a tenth of the cargo is filled with actual
products!

Answer me! What the hell is going on? You were the
ones who transported it here!

...You'll have to ask Luna, Ltd. since they're the
ones who prepared the cargo.

We just robbed the cargo as requested. You didn't ask
us to inspect its contents.

Damn it! Were you not the slightest bit suspicious
while transporting it here?!

Whether or not we had any suspicions, we weren't
going to open it up and check.

I assumed we were under strict orders not to touch
the contents because you intended to reuse the goods
you robbed.

And people like you are always eager to nitpick over
whether or not we held up our end of the job.
Y-You bastard—
...Sounds like you've entered the blame game.
Who's there?!
Heh...
Hehe!
...This is not good!
What're you talking about?
You're surprisingly clueless for a merchant.

The fact that the enemy is here means they've killed
all the guards outside!
Wha...What?!

If you value your life, hurry up and release the
wolves!
A-Alright!
Ooh! Finally, some half-decent opponents!
I'll leave them to you, Delta.
Hehehe... Looks like a worthy hunt!
Trustworthy mercenaries, huh? Color me surprised.

I thought you'd at least take a peek at the cargo's
contents, giving you some clue into our intentions.

If you've been tracking all the cargo, as long as some
contained genuine products, it was only a matter of
time until you discovered this location.

Young lady...I can sense from the coldness in your
eyes and your blade that you're never one to let
your enemies escape.

My guess is you've been lying in wait here for the
merchants since tracking down this place.

I've been in this business for a long time. It looks
like I've finally drawn the short end of the stick!
What?! Don't speak that way in front of your client!
When met with force, we will return that force in kind.

Our people have already destroyed the base where you
brought the rest of the cargo.

...I know you're just a hired hand, but I can't let
you off the hook since you assisted A-Okay Co.
This is where you die!
Eeek...!
Bring it on!
Hyaaaahhh!!!
